After the appropriate entry check, each content
type (e.g., narration, overlay, About) is evaluated
for access independently. This logic supports:

This Ô¨Çow governs how access is determined at both piece and
hotspot levels, based on how the user enters and what
content types are gated. It includes session state handling,
email veriÔ¨Åcation, subscription prompts, and deep-link
(for Diary of Deji Interactive Art Pieces)
